NAME tea

DLG SPR_0
It's getting late. Maybe you should take a walk and see the moon? Meow, meow.

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_1
What a lovely bed, what a lovely nap! 

DLG SPR_2
Can you see the moon? If you go up these steps, there's a tree. I left something up there for you.

DLG SPR_3
It's a present! After gleefully unwrapping it, I find a golden telescope. Perfect for looking at the moon with! 

END 0


END undefined
I sit atop the tree branch and gaze up at the bright, shimmering moon in front of me. My fox nose sniffing the cold, winter air. I am at peace.

END undefinee


VAR a
42
